titleInfo.title: QSI-Fostoria DC, LLC v. General Electric Capital Business Asset Funding Co
titleInfo.subTitle: Order: BACM 2001-1 Central Park West, LLC 's motion for summary judgment as to its right to judgment in its favor as to the monies obtained by QSI Fostoria D.C., LLC from General Electric Capital Business Asset Funding Corporation is denied in part and granted in part. The motion of QSI Fostoria D.C., LLC for summary judgment as to the monies obtained from General Electric Capital Business Asset Funding Corporation is denied. The motion of BACM 2001-1 Central Park West, LLC for summary judgment as to the proceeds obtained by QSI Fostoria D.C., LLC from the Quality Stores, Inc. bankruptcy is granted. The motion of QSI Fostoria D.C., LLC for summary judgment as to the proceeds obtained from the Quality Stores, Inc. bankruptcy is denied. A scheduling conference is set for February 12, 2007 at noon.(Related Doc # 236) (Related Doc # 242). Signed by Judge James G. Carr on 1/17/2007.(S,AL)

extension.searchTitle: USCOURTS 3:02-cv-07466; QSI-Fostoria DC, LLC v. General Electric Capital Business Asset Funding Co;
extension.courtName: United States District Court Northern District of Ohio
extension.docketText: Order: BACM 2001-1 Central Park West, LLC 's motion for summary judgment as to its right to judgment in its favor as to the monies obtained by QSI Fostoria D.C., LLC from General Electric Capital Business Asset Funding Corporation is denied in part and granted in part. The motion of QSI Fostoria D.C., LLC for summary judgment as to the monies obtained from General Electric Capital Business Asset Funding Corporation is denied. The motion of BACM 2001-1 Central Park West, LLC for summary judgment as to the proceeds obtained by QSI Fostoria D.C., LLC from the Quality Stores, Inc. bankruptcy is granted. The motion of QSI Fostoria D.C., LLC for summary judgment as to the proceeds obtained from the Quality Stores, Inc. bankruptcy is denied. A scheduling conference is set for February 12, 2007 at noon.(Related Doc # 236) (Related Doc # 242). Signed by Judge James G. Carr on 1/17/2007.(S,AL)

titleInfo.title: QSI-Fostoria DC, LLC v. General Electric Capital Business Asset Funding Co
titleInfo.subTitle: Order: The motion of the plaintiff-intervenor BACM 2001-1 Central Park West, LLC to certify as a final judgment portions of the order entered January 17, 2007, is overruled as premature, without prejudice. Plaintiff-intervenor granted leave to file its opposition to the original plaintiff's motion for reconsideration on or before April 16, 2007; reply to be filed on or before April 30, 2007. (Related Doc # 252). Signed by Judge James G. Carr on 4/3/2007.(S,AL)

titleInfo.title: QSI-Fostoria DC, LLC v. General Electric Capital Business Asset Funding Co
titleInfo.subTitle: Order: the motion of the plaintiff-intervenor BACM 2001-1 Central Park West, LLC for an order directing the Clerk to distribute funds in the Court's Registry is granted. BACM 2001-1 Cental Park West shall comply with Local Rule 67.2 (Disbursements) before the Clerk can release said funds. (Related Doc # 253). Signed by Judge James G. Carr on 4/3/2007.(S,AL)

titleInfo.title: QSI-Fostoria DC, LLC v. General Electric Capital Business Asset Funding Co
titleInfo.subTitle: Order: QSIs motion for reconsideration is granted as to BACMs Cross-Claims for fraud and conversion; and on reconsideration, summary judgment is entered in favor of QSI and against BACM as to such claims. Granted as to QSIs payment of interest on funds it previously deposited in the court registry, and, on reconsideration, ordered that QSI is liable for interests on the withheld funds only from the date of their receipt by QSI until the date of its deposit of those funds in the Courts Registry. Denied in all other respects. The parties shall file a status report on or before August 30, 2007, informing the Court whether any issues remain to be resolved by this Court, and if so, identifying those issues. Related Doc # 258 Status Report due by 8/30/2007.. Signed by Judge James G. Carr on 8/17/2007.(S,AL)

extension.searchTitle: USCOURTS 3:02-cv-07466; QSI-Fostoria DC, LLC v. General Electric Capital Business Asset Funding Co;
extension.courtName: United States District Court Northern District of Ohio
extension.docketText: Order: QSIs motion for reconsideration is granted as to BACMs Cross-Claims for fraud and conversion; and on reconsideration, summary judgment is entered in favor of QSI and against BACM as to such claims. Granted as to QSIs payment of interest on funds it previously deposited in the court registry, and, on reconsideration, ordered that QSI is liable for interests on the withheld funds only from the date of their receipt by QSI until the date of its deposit of those funds in the Courts Registry. Denied in all other respects. The parties shall file a status report on or before August 30, 2007, informing the Court whether any issues remain to be resolved by this Court, and if so, identifying those issues. Related Doc # 258 Status Report due by 8/30/2007.. Signed by Judge James G. Carr on 8/17/2007.(S,AL)

titleInfo.title: QSI-Fostoria DC, LLC v. General Electric Capital Business Asset Funding Co
titleInfo.subTitle: Order: Leave granted to BACM, if it desires to do so, to file a renewed motion for certification under Fed. R. Civ. P. 54(b) on or before October 19, 2007; opposition due November 5, 2007; reply due November 15, 2007. BACM motion for sanctions is overruled. QSI's motion for an extension of time is overruled as moot. BACM motion to compel discovery is granted; QSI to answer interrogatories and produce documents by October 15, 2007; no sanctions imposed. (Related Doc # 264) 268 275). Signed by Judge James G. Carr on 10/4/2007.(S,AL)
